name: Die Form
description: '''Die Form''' is a French [[industrial music|post-industrial]] and [[electronic music|electronic]] band formed in 1977â€“78. The name 'Die Form' means '(the) form/shape' in [[German language|German]], like the [[Bauhaus]] diary, and is a play on the English homonym 'deform' and on the French homonym 'difforme' (deformed).
